sorcer.util

Class ProviderLocator

  • java.lang.Object
    • sorcer.util.ProviderLocator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DynamicAccessor

    public class ProviderLocator
extends Object
implements DynamicAccessor
    ProviderLoactor is a simple wrapper class over Jini's LookupDiscover. It which returns the first matching instance of a service either via unicast or multicast discovery

        Locates a service via Unicast discovery
        Parameters:
        lusHost - The name of the host where a Jini lookup service is running
